Job Description As a Software Co-op Student, you will be working with a diverse and experienced team of engineering professionals, you will follow Scrum practices while learning and supporting the Software Development Life Cycle from our technical leads. This may be the perfect opportunity for you if you are passionate about developing and implementing the best software and systems in the industry and working with leading edge technology and versatile tools! This position follows a Hybrid working model with a mix of home and on-site work. 3 days a week onsite required. The responsibilities and range of activities will vary, but in general you can expect to: • Perform some design, analysis and test functions under the mentorship of more senior engineers. • Document analyses, designs and tests (e.g., tech notes, sections of requirements specifications, design documents, test plans and test reports) in the format prescribed by standard templates with the supervision of a more experienced engineer. • Implement software routines to meet software requirements. • Maintain code base in accordance with coding standards. • Some development and performance of integration test and debug of implementations. • Some development and performance of design verification test under the supervision of more senior engineers. • Investigate system problem reports and field incident reports; perform root cause and trend analyses; • Provide technical support during high-level integration and qualification testing. • Provide technical support to internal customers. • Perform developmental configuration management activities. • Present work at design reviews or other types of peer reviews. Some travel may be required to support internal and external customers. • Additional Information We believe the unique contributions of each of our colleagues are key in our ability to drive innovation. By fostering a culture of belonging, encouraging idea sharing at all levels, and reinforcing the very real impact of what we do, we offer an environment where everyone can take pride in their work.
